# Pace

Your command line buddy to make work actually enjoyable.

```plaintext

      ___         ___           ___           ___
     /\  \       /\  \         /\__\         /\__\
    /::\  \     /::\  \       /:/  /        /:/ _/_
   /:/\:\__\   /:/\:\  \     /:/  /        /:/ /\__\
  /:/ /:/  /  /:/ /::\  \   /:/  /  ___   /:/ /:/ _/_
 /:/_/:/  /  /:/_/:/\:\__\ /:/__/  /\__\ /:/_/:/ /\__\
 \:\/:/  /   \:\/:/  \/__/ \:\  \ /:/  / \:\/:/ /:/  /
  \::/__/     \::/__/       \:\  /:/  /   \::/_/:/  /
   \:\  \      \:\  \        \:\/:/  /     \:\/:/  /
    \:\__\      \:\__\        \::/  /       \::/  /
     \/__/       \/__/         \/__/         \/__/

```

## Installation

```bash
go install github.com/lucas-tremaroli/pace@latest
```

## Usage

```bash
pace
```
